overview: The film tells a motivational story of a disabled girl who pursuit her dreams. Gong Beibei, a grade 2 student studied in high school, was misunderstanded as a introverted, reticent freak. When she is alone she has super powers that can levitate and hold things. She likes to record her super-power experience through drawing comics. Due to her mother died in a car accident when she was young and the lack of motor function, she has physical defects which causes her inferiority and loneliness. Until one day she got a car crash, the door of youth gradually opened, which changes her life.
title: Morning Princess
